channel.title: Mssqlserver on Coding notes - and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Mssqlserver on Coding notes - and snippets

item.title: Unattended SQL Server Installation with PowerShell
item.description: Download SQL Server installation media from here and select Download Media. Express Edition Run PowerShell as administrator: cd C:\SQL2019\SQLEXPR_x64_ENU .\setup.exe /Q /HIDECONSOLE=0 /ACTION=INSTALL /SUPPRESSPRIVACYSTATEMENTNOTICE /IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS=1 /FEATURES=SQLENGINE /UPDATEENABLED=0 /INSTANCENAME="MSSQLSERVER" /ADDCURRENTUSERASSQLADMIN=1 /SECURITYMODE=SQL /SKIPRULES=RebootRequiredCheck /SAPWD="Pasword_01" /SQLSVCSTARTUPTYPE=AUTOMATIC /INDICATEPROGRESS Developer Edition Run PowerShell as administrator: cd C:\SQL2019\Developer_ENU .\setup.exe /q /ACTION=Install /INSTANCENAME=MSSQLSERVER /FEATURES=SQLEngine /UPDATEENABLED=0 /SQLSVCACCOUNT='NT AUTHORITY\NETWORK SERVICE' /SQLSYSADMINACCOUNTS='BUILTIN\ADMINISTRATORS' /TCPENABLED=1 /NPENABLED=0 /IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS /INDICATEPROGRESS /SECURITYMODE=SQL /SAPWD="Password_01" Uninstall .\setup.exe /q /ACTION=Uninstall /INSTANCENAME=MSSQLSERVER /FEATURES=SQLEngine /INDICATEPROGRESS
